data.message: I have 17 people following me and their phiotos and names domnot show up under followers. Can you show them or block them? I cannot see who they are!

replies.message: Hi Linda. If you've allowed people to follow you, you can see a list of your followers by going to your profile, clicking Friends below your cover photo and then clicking Followers. If you don't have any followers, you won't see this option. Additionally, you can learn more about managing your followers here: http://bit.ly/2qtLqDT. -Jessica

Facebook I did go to friends and to followers. It only shows one the other 16 are invisible and that bothers me because I cannot see them. Can you delete the followers since I csant see them?
